title: Quickest Electrical Connection Setup
description: In 2019, Jordan had one of the fastest times to obtain an electrical connection, averaging just 3.8 days.

title: Minimal Land Below Sea Level
description: In 2015, only 0.004% of Jordan's total land area was below 5 meters in elevation, indicating minimal risk from rising sea levels.

title: High Child Employment in Agriculture
description: In 2016, 40.93% of male economically active children aged 7-14 were employed in agriculture, highlighting a significant reliance on child labor in this sector.

title: Predominance of Unpaid Family Work Among Female Children
description: In 2016, 97.3% of female children in employment aged 7-14 were unpaid family workers, indicating a high level of unpaid labor among young girls.

title: High Average Working Hours for Male Children
description: In 2016, male children aged 7-14 working only averaged 50.53 hours per week, one of the highest globally.

title: Significant Unemployment Among Educated Males
description: In 2023, 20.645% of the male labor force with advanced education was unemployed, indicating challenges in the job market for educated males.
